titleInfo.title: Letter, Guillaume-Michel Perrault to Madame and Cher Soeur, April 30, 1788

mods.abstract: Guillaume-Michel Perrault was born in Quebec in 1726 He settled on a plantation near New Orleans In this letter to his sister-in-law, he gives a first-hand account of the 1788 fire that destroyed a large portion of the city and describes the personal tragedy and losses of individuals and their efforts to rebuild.

copyInformation.subLocation: LSU Special Collections: Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Manuscript Collection

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
